title: Crimson Seeds
summaries: Crimson Seeds are seeds which can be planted on Dirt Blocks to create Crimson grass, which will then spread The Crimson in all directions. They drop from the Eye of Cthulhu and can be purchased from the Dryad for 5 SC each during a Blood Moon in a world with Crimson. In a world with Corruption, Crimson Seeds can be purchased from the Dryad if she is spoken to in a Hardmode Graveyard(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

Crimson Seeds can be used to <linked>farm</linked> <linked>Vicious Mushrooms</linked> and may be used to spread Crimson in Corrupt worlds. In the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, Crimson Seeds cannot be obtained within Corrupt worlds and must instead be brought over from a Crimson world.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, Crimson Seeds can also be planted on <linked>Mud Blocks</linked> to create <linked>Crimson Jungle grass</linked>.
